version_description:
Thank you for using the Robot Call Blocker app! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Here are some new features you will see in this version:
- Official release version!
- view and edit blocked numbers<

MAJOR RELEASE:
Thank you for using the Robot Call Blocker app! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Here are some new features you will see in this version:
- Block calls from our list of over 250,000

Happy New Year! We are blocking more calls than ever before in 2020 - here is what is in the latest update:

• Updated blocklist with new numbers
• Updated text message filtering keywords
• Performance improvements

We've added Background Refresh! No more waiting minutes for your blocklist to finish refreshing. Simply start the refresh, leave the app and we will notify you when the refresh has completed.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Blocked th
